'''Spying''' is a feature of [[multiplayer]] games, which allow you to see through the viewpoint of another non-competing [[player]]. Spying is normally done with the <tt>spynext</tt> and <tt>spyprev</tt> [[console commands]]. While watching a [[demo]], it is also possible to spy on an opponent player.
While spying, the [[HUD]] remains that of the player, but the viewpoint is that of the spied player. [[Category:Features]][[Category:Glossary]]
